channel.title: looks on Essence Learning
channel.description: Recent content in looks on Essence Learning

item.title: Wear off your wrinkles
item.description: Although all of us age, we can slow down wrinkles and keep our skin smooth and young for a long time by giving it both meticulous care and attention from both within and outside. Looking young is an essential part of the hospitality career. Dry skin is the chief cause of facial wrinkles. Dry skin requires constant attention over a period of months to turn it into a supple skin.
